title: STRANGER THINGS/COOK UP (Drake Response)
lyrics:
1 Contributor
STRANGER THINGS/COOK UP (Drake Response) Lyrics
[Verse]
My phone and twitter was blowing up last night
5am in Talledaga, my mind reaching new heights
Im not no pussy Aubrey, i will go feral on this mic
Killing a rap nigga has always been my hobby
Seen a bunch of fans at the ritz yelling fuck drake in the lobby

I might just shake and bake, the rap game got me feeling like Ricky bobby, Seen stranger things in this nigga dm's i Ain't talking Millie bobby. rebel nigga did my Shmurda dance cause i'm really rowdy, Got forced to reveal your child but acted like you did it Proudly
Crying to Lebron, making songs like "My GOATS's Really doubt me"

This record got me feeling devious so take a seat Aubrey, Look up (Look up to your father son) And nigga if you talking push ups then put that rеcord for push up, you know his clipse ain't empty so you stopped ,This nigga shook up (BUM!)

A Tummy tucking liposuction having nigga could nеver do a push up, and if aubrey wants the smoke then it's no joke lil nigga cook up, I'll be rushing to get shooting just like Putin i'll go nuclear

Hook:
This lil nigga really tryna get a look in
Bitch shut the fuck up we don't care bout no bookings
You won't smash no bitch unless she looks ten (both ways)
Is Drizzy creeping on your daughter? I don't know Twin
Know twin, If she legal will he smash? No twin, No Twin, We might fuck around and go spin, If he respond ima drop another song by ten, cause niggas ain't on shit and it's evident

Verse 2:
Niggas talking bout size 7 feet, nigga my feet still bigger than the chicks that you meet, Keep talking bout Whitney like shit's sweet Well if you wanted to be whitney, It would sound like this, G. like: And I---- Will always, Love Kids
Nigga fuck you think this shit is? It's Kenny bitch, dont need no switch, ima press it till it's empty, Whats luv in the rap game when jealous ones really envy? And nigga catch me on the breakfast club i might just chop it up with envy, Massacring all my enemies, Living in their mind rent free

Hook:
This lil nigga really tryna get a look in
Bitch shut the fuck up we don't care bout no bookings
You won't smash no bitch unless she looks ten (both ways)
Is Drizzy creeping on your daughter? I don't know Twin
Know twin, If she legal will he smash? No twin, No Twin, We might fuck around and go spin, If he respond ima drop another song by ten, cause niggas ain't on shit and it's evident



Verse 3:
Gambling and drinking, Through the glass i can see his life is at stake
Ok aubrey you mike? On topic thats the icing of the cake
Read between the lines when i prophesise the rhymes that i make
TBC-
